task.title: Driving home
task.shortdesc: The drive to Northern Virginia from Blacksburg is 4 hours long so Marjan must prepare for her departure my packing her car and preparing for the drive.

taskbody.context: Marjan will pack her luggage into her car and inspect it to make sure everything is in check before driving.

step.cmd: Pack suitcases and belongings into trunk of car
Inspect outside of car (tire pressure, mirrors, etc.)
Get in driver's seat and put on seat belt
Enter home address into Google Maps and click "GO"
Follow navigation until destination is reached
